## jx get devpod

Lists the DevPods

### Synopsis

Display the available DevPods 

For more documentation see: https://jenkins-x.io/developing/devpods/

```
jx get devpod [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # List all the possible DevPods
  jx get devPod
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for devpod
```
